content: I'd like to explore this idea of reframing negative self-talk and practicing self-compassion in relation to my writing challenge. I've been doing a daily writing challenge for 4 weeks now, and I've noticed that some of the stories I tell myself about myself are affecting my writing. Can you give me some examples of how to reframe negative self-talk and practice self-compassion when I'm writing, specifically in the context of my daily writing challenge?
